con:method.name: getStudentLearningSupportResponse
con:method.con:description:
Retrieve a particular response generated by a particular student's Learning Support need.

Note: Learning support needs are recorded as WellbeingCharacteristics

con:parameter.con:name: page
con:parameter.con:description: Return nth page of results; default 0 `page=2`; applies to any call with repeated data

con:parameter.con:name: max
con:parameter.con:description: Maximum items per page, default 10,000; `max=100`; applies to any call with repeated data

con:parameter.con:name: unwrap
con:parameter.con:description: Remove top level wrapper from json results in single result reponses; `unwrap=1`

con:parameter.con:name: human
con:parameter.con:description: For code set fields, translate code to human readable form; `human=1`

con:parameter.con:name: field
con:parameter.con:description: Field to filter on when used with **pattern**; `field=FamilyName`

con:parameter.con:name: Accept
con:parameter.con:description: Standard HTTP accept header, choose between JSON and XML for response. Defaults to XML if this header is missing.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-OrganisationRefId
con:parameter.con:description: The Ministry of Education Organisation Id of the Provider(or other Organisation); used to limit the scope of the API endpoint to a particular MoE Organisation.

con:parameter.con:name: StudentLearningSupportResponseRefId
con:parameter.con:description: Unique identifier (GUID) that uniquely identifies the particular set of meta-data and metrics pertaining to a particular student's Learning Support needs.

con:representation.con:sampleContent: <StudentLearningSupportResponse> <StudentLearningSupportResponseRefId>461b63b4-cfef-4820-8501-e7dbbb4555cb</StudentLearningSupportResponseRefId> <Organisation> <RefId>9651</RefId> </Organisation> <Student> <RefId>ca285746-359d-7510-1a8c-36432a901a16</RefId> </Student> <LearningSupportNeed> <RefId>ca222226-359d-7510-1a8c-36432a901a16</RefId> </LearningSupportNeed> <ResponseType>ADA</ResponseType> <ResponseDetail>ACU</ResponseDetail> <ResponseGoals>The student is confident in their reading ability.</ResponseGoals> <TierOfResponse>IND</TierOfResponse> <InternalResponse> <ProvidedBy>TEA</ProvidedBy> <ProvidedByName>Jane Doe</ProvidedByName> <Status>MON</Status> <FundedBy>BOA</FundedBy> </InternalResponse> <ReviewDate>2020-12-31</ReviewDate> <ReviewList> <Review> <Reviewer> <RefId>ca2bbb26-359d-2480-1a8c-36432a901a16</RefId> </Reviewer> <ReviewDate>2019-11-11</ReviewDate> <ReviewComments>The student is progressing well. Ability to identify words is increasing and is gaining confidence in trying to sound out words they do not recognise.</ReviewComments> <NextReviewDate>2010-01-21</NextReviewDate> </Review> </ReviewList> <AttachmentList> <Document> <RefId>ca2bbb26-359d-3480-1a8c-36432a901a16</RefId> </Document> </AttachmentList> <RecordAudit> <CreatedDateTime>2019-10-28T06:30:57+1200</CreatedDateTime> <CreatedBy> <RefId>ca222226-359d-2480-1a8c-36432a901a16</RefId> </CreatedBy> </RecordAudit> </StudentLearningSupportResponse>

con:parameter.con:description: Standard HTTP accept header, choose between JSON and XML for response. Defaults to XML if this header is missing.

con:parameter.con:description: The Ministry of Education Organisation Id of the Provider(or other Organisation); used to limit the scope of the API endpoint to a particular MoE Organisation.

con:method.name: patchStudentLearningSupportResponse
con:method.con:description:
Update one or more fields of a particular response generated by a particular student's Learning Support need.

Note: Learning support needs are recorded as WellbeingCharacteristics

con:parameter.con:name: Accept
con:parameter.con:description: Standard HTTP accept header, choose between JSON and XML for response. Defaults to XML if this header is missing.

con:parameter.con:name: X-Edsby-OrganisationRefId
con:parameter.con:description: The Ministry of Education Organisation Id of the Provider(or other Organisation); used to limit the scope of the API endpoint to a particular MoE Organisation.

con:parameter.con:name: StudentLearningSupportResponseRefId
con:parameter.con:description: Unique identifier (GUID) that uniquely identifies the particular set of meta-data and metrics pertaining to a particular student's Learning Support needs.
